Table 100. Property crimes, 2005: Percent of victimizations reported to the police, by value of loss and type of crime

column2: Percent of all victimizations reported to the police

column1: *Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/The proportions refer only to losses of cash and/or property, and exclude the value  of property damage.
b/Includes data for victims who did not provide a specific value for their losses.
c/Includes items that had no value.
